results.title: [MERCAPTIZOL INDUCED HYPOGLYCEMIA - A CASE REPORT].
results.text_hl: Two weeks earlier, while traveling in Peru, she developed @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Adenoma_Hyperfunctioning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566386 @@@thyrotoxicosis@@@ and began taking Mercaptizol 30 mg a day and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ 100 mg.

citations.NLM: Aviran Barak N. [MERCAPTIZOL INDUCED HYPOGLYCEMIA - A CASE REPORT]. Harefuah. 2022 Sep;161(9):546-547. PMID: 36168155

results.title: Atenolol in human plasma and breast milk.
results.text_hl: To assess the problem of continuing @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ in a breast-feeding mother with @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ associated with @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Adenoma_Hyperfunctioning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566386 @@@thyrotoxicosis@@@, studies were performed to determine simultaneous plasma and breast milk concentrations of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ after a single dose of 50 mg and on continuous therapy of varying weekly dosages.

citations.NLM: White WB, Andreoli JW, Wong SH, Cohn RD. Atenolol in human plasma and breast milk. Obstet Gynecol. 1984 Mar;63(3 Suppl):42S-44S. PMID: 6700880

results.title: [Autonomic contribution to the blood pressure and heart rate variability changes in early experimental hyperthyroidism].
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ neither modified HR nor BP variability in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with hyperthyrodism.

results.title: Autonomic contribution to the blood pressure and heart rate variability changes in early experimental hyperthyroidism.
results.text_hl: DESIGN AND METHODS: @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Adenoma_Hyperfunctioning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566386 @@@Thyrotoxicosis@@@ was produced by injections of @CHEMICAL_Thyroxine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013974 @@@L-thyroxine@@@ (0.5 mg/kg/day for five days).

citations.NLM: Safa-Tisseront V, Ponchon P, Laude D, Elghozi JL. Autonomic contribution to the blood pressure and heart rate variability changes in early experimental hyperthyroidism. J Hypertens. 1998 Dec;16(12 Pt 2):1989-92. PMID: 9886887

results.title: METHIMAZOLE-INDUCED AGRANULOCYTOSIS AND SEPSIS: WAS THYROID STORM PRESENT OR JUST BEING MIMICKED?
results.text_hl: Cephepime was promptly initiated. For @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Adenoma_Hyperfunctioning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566386 @@@thyrotoxicosis@@@ management, @CHEMICAL_Cholestyramine_Resin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002792 @@@cholestyramine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ were prescribed.

results.title: Thyroidectomy in a two-year old for graves' disease
results.text_hl: Despite maximal @SPECIES_9606 @@@outpatient@@@ and inpatient treatment with @CHEMICAL_Methimazole @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008713 @@@methimazole@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Prednisone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011241 @@@prednisone@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Potassium_Iodide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011193 @@@SSKI@@@, he suffered persistent @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Adenoma_Hyperfunctioning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566386 @@@thyrotoxicosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Shakhsheer BA, Bordini B, Abdulrasool L, Grogan R, Kaplan E. Thyroidectomy in a two-year old for graves' disease Int J Surg Case Rep. 2015;8C():131-3. PMID: 25661638
